model.strategy

Class SimplifiedBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.strategy.SimplifiedBoard

  • public class SimplifiedBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is created as a purely functional representation of the board, made to make simulations on it easier and quicker.
    Author:
    PMC

    • Method Detail

      • simulateMove

        public int simulateMove(int x,
                        int y,
                        Color color,
                        int maxDepth,
                        int alpha,
                        int beta)
        Method that simulated the placing of a cube in the (x,y) coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - First component of the coordinates
        y - Second component of the coordinates
        color - Color of the player whose move is being simulated
        maxDepth - Number of turns left to explore after the current mvoe is simulated
        alpha - Alpha value for the alpha-beta prune method
        beta - Beta value for the alpha-beta prune method
        Returns:
        The score that will be guaranteed to the player after playing the calculated move

        Getter of the size of the board's side

        Size of the board's side

        public int getSimulatedScore(Color color)
        Getter of the score of the player who matches the color in the current state of the simulation
        Parameters:
        color - Color of the player whose score wants to be known
        Returns:
        Score of the player who matches the color in the current state of the simulation

        public boolean tryToAddCube(int x,
                            int y)
        Method that tries to add a cube to the board at the given coordinates
        Parameters:
        x - First component of the coordinates
        y - Second component of the coordinates
        Returns:
        True if the cube can be added to the board, false otherwise
